code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{GlobeAltIcon,DocumentTextIcon,PhotoIcon,VideoCameraIcon,ClockIcon,UsersIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchStats=()=>{const stats=[{icon:GlobeAltIcon,label:'Web Pages Indexed',value:'50B+',color:'text-blue-600',bgColor:'bg-blue-100 dark:bg-blue-900/20'},{icon:DocumentTextIcon,label:'Documents Processed',value:'100M+',color:'text-green-600',bgColor:'bg-green-100 dark:bg-green-900/20'},{icon:PhotoIcon,label:'Images Analyzed',value:'10B+',color:'text-purple-600',bgColor:'bg-purple-100 dark:bg-purple-900/20'},{icon:VideoCameraIcon,label:'Videos Indexed',value:'1B+',color:'text-orange-600',bgColor:'bg-orange-100 dark:bg-orange-900/20'},{icon:ClockIcon,label:'Avg.
